root: ^The ocean central hub. Always heard it was a beautiful sight, and that there were some interesting shells to collect here.
^But the place is a little too active for my taste.
^I best avoid them, don't want to get tangled up with those guys.
^[You hear a distorted voice in the proximity]
^[You can almost make out what they’re trying to say]
^UGH What a pain, I don’t have time for this.
^But I guess my conscience is gonna feel bad if I don’t help otherwise.
^And I won’t hear the end of it from Sai fi she finds out about this.
^HEY WHERE ARE YOU!? DO YOU NEED HELP!?
^[The muffled voice continues speak in response to your call]
^Oh carp, are they buried underneath all this garbage.
^Well, might as well do what I originally came here to do.
